Test for http://crbug.com/360453

You should see an invalidation at x=40 of the h2 or this test is broken.


Chromium

(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 8.00 88.00 32.00 67.00)
        (rect 8.00 88.00 32.00 36.00)
        (rect 8.00 108.00 111.00 27.00)
        (rect 40.00 108.00 111.00 27.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
